copilotSupport.description: Context-aware suggestions for IRIs, prefixes, variables, builtins, and rule templates. Suggest builtins and their argument signatures as users type.
Show documentation for builtins, prefixes, and rule constructs when hovering. Display type info, descriptions, and links to relevant N3Logic or W3C docs.
Show argument types and descriptions for builtins and functions as the user types.
Enable navigation to prefix declarations, rule definitions, and builtin documentation.
Allow renaming of variables, prefixes, and rule names across the document.
Offer quick fixes for undefined prefixes, unbound variables, or common syntax errors. Suggest adding missing prefix declarations or correcting builtin names.
Add a document formatter for N3Logic, ensuring consistent indentation and spacing.
Show inlay hints for variable types, builtin argument types, or inferred values.
Expand semantic tokens to distinguish between different types of IRIs, variables, and builtins.
Warn about anti-patterns, deprecated features, or inefficient rule constructs.
Provide code snippets for common N3Logic patterns, rules, and builtin usage.
Add detailed, up-to-date instructions in .github/copilot-instructions.md to help Copilot generate high-quality N3Logic code and explanations.
